discourse_list.title: Intangible Asset Agreed Modification of Management - 2022-11-18 - abuse-reports.makerdao.com

content.content: Intangible Asset Agreed Modification of Management - 2022-11-18  Action Date - 2022-11-25 (post date + 1 week)  Asset(s)  subdomain: abuse-reports.makerdao.com   Asset Type: subdomain Asset Owner: DAI Foundation Platform Manager: Techops core-unit (discord channel) Content Manager: Dai Foundation ([email protected]) Purpose: Host webpage with overview of reported scamming and phishing sites/accounts that infringes on the Maker or Dai trademarks, and a status on the effort to disable the site/account Last Modification: -   Supporters @Derek @dumitru @sorenpeter  Reason for Modification With the planned overview page users that encounter a scamming/phishin site/account that infringes on the Maker or Dai trademarks, can check whether this already is a known to Dai Foundation. If not the page will hold instructions for how to report the abuser, and it will subsequently be possible to follow the status on the effort to disable the reported site/account.
This topic was automatically closed after 90 days. New replies are no longer allowed.
